alert.note: Alert for Clark; Deuel; Hamlin (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued December 25 at 1:22AM MST until December 26 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of one quarter to four tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Clark, Hamlin and Deuel Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 3 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
